title: MetaMask’s Secret ‘Intents’ Project Could Radically Change How Users Interact With Blockchains
description: MetaMask is quietly testing new tech that uses third parties to route user transactions. It will eventually be made available outside of MetaMask and will be closely scrutinized for how it manages to avoid centralization concerns.

title: As Ethereum Tests $2,6K, Investors Keep Their Eyes on These Cryptos
description: Discover the latest crypto market trends as Ethereum (ETH) tests a significant $2.6K mark. See why savvy investors are also expanding their focus to promising tokens like Sei (SEI), Aptos (APT) and NEAR Protocol (NEAR), each presenting unique growth prospects. Dive into our detailed analysis of these emerging cryptos and learn how they are navigating through market dynamics, token unlocks, and potential rallies in a landscape dominated by ETH's impressive strides.

title: Bitcoin (BTC) dominance is weak - altcoins await
description: Bitcoin (BTC) could make one more try for a new local high at $50,000, or it could stay in a range around the current price. The latter scenario could potentially be very positive for altcoins.

title: $9.6 Billion in 3 Days — ETF Analyst Highlights Remarkable Early Success of Bitcoin ETFs
